Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: "On the streets of Constellia in the early morning, sunlight spills like shattered gold across the neat stone pavement, but from every angle, there's no sign of the human Commandant anywhere."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'This is definitely the right address...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Repeatedly checking the address the human Commandant sent via email, Nanami looks around in confusion.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wait, did I get stood up?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Uhh... what in the world is this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'On a table nearby, a conspicuous ticket lies beneath a small clay figurine with gray hair.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Uhm? Is this for me?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Moving aside the small clay figurine that's obviously modeled after herself, Nanami flips open the colorful ticket and finds a line of familiar handwriting staring back at her."}
{1: "<color=#ffffffff><size=50>—Follow the instructions and begin Nanami's Great Adventure!</size></color>"}
{3: "—Follow the instructions and begin Nanami's Great Adventure!"}
{1: "<color=#ffffffff><size=50>Please walk fifty steps forward, then turn right at the first intersection! That's where you will claim your first gift!</size></color>"}
{3: "Please walk fifty steps forward, then turn right at the first intersection! That's where you will claim your first gift!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hey, I totally didn't see this coming!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami holds the ticket high above her head and charges forward in excitement following the instructions.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{3: 'In the shadows down the street, two figures crouch together furtively.'}
{2: 'Shhh!', 3: '48', 4: "Keep it down or else she's gonna see us.", 5: '48'}
{3: "The little robot's voice becomes slightly distorted as it quickly adjusts its volume."}
{2: "She didn't see us here, did she?", 3: '53'}
{2: 'Cathy', 3: 'Rest assured, Cathy is very familiar with the streets in this area. Cathy will definitely help you deliver this spectacular surprise!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you.', 3: '55', 4: 'Glad to hear that...', 5: '55'}
{3: 'Nanami always has holiday surprises prepared for you, but this time... you wanted to do something for her instead.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cathy', 3: 'Your date has arrived at the first designated location—', 4: '18'}
{3: 'The little robot makes beeping sounds the entire way as you follow it through a side path.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wow! It\'s "Cardman Rider: Stardust Remnant"! I\'ve been looking for this book forever!', 4: '1'}
{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>—Next, please advance to the third exhibition hall on your left—</size></color>'}
{3: '—Next, please advance to the third exhibition hall on your left—'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory678.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory678.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ohhh! It\'s "The Endless Sunset Garden"! I\'ve been dying to watch this movie with the commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>—Go straight ahead, and when you reach the end of the street, check the table on your right—</size></color>'}
{3: '—Go straight ahead, and when you reach the end of the street, check the table on your right—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'A "Journey to Space" game cartridge! I\'ve been wanting to play this with the commandant for ages—', 4: '1'}
{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>—Finally, please turn around—</size></color>'}
{3: '—Finally, please turn around—'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami recognizes the voice even before she fully turns around.'}
{3: 'Tossing aside the armful of gifts, Nanami spins around and throws her arms around you.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I knew it! I knew you did all of these for me as a Valentine's Day surprise!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm super duper happy!", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm glad you're happy, Nanami.", 3: '116', 4: 'Now...', 5: '116'}
{2: 'One last surprise for you...', 3: '117'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Fine mist erupts from the fountain, intermingling with dazzling candies and colorful confetti. The wrappers reflect a kaleidoscope of colors in the morning sunlight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'A candy fountain—!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Surrounded by the iridescent mist, Nanami gazes up in wonder at the shower of candies raining down from above.'}
{2: 'You always do all sorts of things for me, Nanami.', 3: '128', 4: 'There are surprises all the time with you around, Nanami.', 5: '128'}
{2: "And I thought I'd do something for you for a change.", 3: '129'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Nanami's pupils reflect fragments of sunlight. She bites her lips and buries herself in your arms."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Just being with you makes me super happy already, Commandant... For some reason, it feels like it's been so long since I last saw you...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I... I really missed you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her voice is muffled, tinged with a hint of bitterness.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ahem! Nanami shouldn't waste time talking here anymore. Do you have anything else planned, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if nothing had just happened, Nanami suddenly jumps away from your arms.'}
{2: "Is there anything you'd like to do, Nanami?", 3: '145', 4: 'Of course, there is.', 5: '145'}
{3: "Based on what you believe Nanami might enjoy, you've already arranged quite a few things to do."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Woohoo! Let's follow your plan today, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami throws her arms up in the air, full of energy.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Annnnnd this is where our adventure in Constellia begins!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, I have a little something prepared for you, Commandant, but that will have to wait until we're done for the day...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'She takes your hand and runs down the sunlit path ahead.'}
